articles.description: Days before the contest, the bilateral ties between India and Pakistan in terms of cricket took a big hit as BCCI secretary Jay Shah announced that the Indian team won't be traveling to the country for Asia Cup 2023. | Cricket
articles.content: The India vs Pakistan encounter at the T20 World Cup was a huge fanfare and the showdown between the two lived up to the expectations. India eventually won the contest by four wickets, but it surely … [+2523 chars]
